name: Ben 10 Samurai Alien
description:
In this game our hero Ben is stuck in the Summo Slammers Smack down video game, having taken the form of an Alien Summo Slammer, with super strength and ninja skills.
Your task will be to help him to defeat the evil Kenko and recover the Ultra-T's item.
Defeat your enemies on the way using the ninja Sword and Ninja Stars and super summo strength.
